kpi.name: M8021C0

kpi_info.title: Number of inter frequency Handover attempts
kpi_info.use: The number of intra LTE inter-frequency Handover attempts. It comprises the intra- and inter-eNB. UPDATED: intra-eNB HO: This counter is updated following the transmission of an RRC Connection Reconfiguration message sent by the eNB to the UE, which indicates a Handover Command to the UE in case that this message is sent in response to the preparation of an inter-frequency Intra eNB Handover.

kpi.kpi_alias: Number of inter frequency Handover attempts
